{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1187\cocoasubrtf340 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 This installation provides add-ons for the Textual IRC Client that are no longer packaged by default because of difficulties with the Mac App Store sandbox environment. \ \ ----------------------------------------------------\ \ Commands available after installation:\ \ \'95 apps \'97 List all running applications.\ \'95 music \'97 iTunes library size information.\ \'95 np \'97 Now playing information for iTunes.\ \'95 page \'97 Information about active page in Safari.\ \'95 spotify \'97 Now playing information for Spotify. \ \'95 yolo \'97 You only live once.\ }
